  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary 
    Class Description
    App
    The JavaFX application
    Ball
    The ball class for all types of balls.
    Ball.BallType
    The type of ball
    BallBuilder
    The builder interface that specify the methods needed to build a ball
    BallBuilderDirector
    The class that builds all the different balls
    BallConfig
    A config class that will contain the ball configuration
    BallObserver
    Class responsible for tracking if the ball has fallen and changing its points accordingly
    BallPocketStrategy
    An interface for the action carried out when a ball falls into a pocket
    BallsConfig
    A config class that will contain all the ball configuration
    BallsConfigFactory
    A config factory that will handle the `ball` section of the config
    BlackBallBuilder
    Builder for black ball
    BlueBallBuilder
    Builder for blue ball
    BrownBallBuilder
    Builder for brown ball
    Caretaker
    Caretake class which stores all the Mementos
    CheatState
    the state removes the ball
    ConfigChecker
    Helper class for configuration check
    ConfigFactory
    The config factory interface for all the config factories
    ConfigFactoryRegistry
    The config factory registry
    ConfigReader
    The instance that reads the config
    Configurable
    An interface for all the config class
    Drawable
    An interface for all the drawable object
    Game
    The game class that runs the game
    GameConfig
    A config class for the game configuration
    GameReset
    Resets game when the method of this instance is called
    GameState
    Interface for the possible game States
    GreenBallBuilder
    Builder for green ball
    Memento
    Memento used to store the balls and the state of the game
    Movable
    An interface for all the object that can move
    MovingState
    state that represents the state where the balls are moving
    Observer
    interface that the observer must abide by
    OrangeBallBuilder
    Builder for orange ball
    Pocket
    The pocket of a pool table
    PocketConfig
    A config class that will contain the pocket configuration
    PocketOnce
    Hide the ball once it falls into the pocket
    PocketsConfig
    A config class that will contain all the pocket configuration
    PocketThrice
    Hide the ball once it falls into the pocket 3 times or spawn it back to its original location.
    PocketTwice
    Hide the ball once it falls into the pocket twice or spawn it back to its original location.
    PoolTable
    A pool table
    PositionConfig
    A config class for the position configuration
    PurpleBallBuilder
    Builder for purple ball
    RedBallBuilder
    Builder for red ball
    SaveCheatState
    Responsible for Saving the memento when the user presses the cheat button so we can have a copy of the game before the button was pressed
    SaveState
    state responsible for saving the game memento
    Scorecard
    A pool Scorecard to keep track of score and time
    SizeConfig
    A config class for the size configuration
    StationaryState
    State that represents the moving ball
    Subject
    Interface the subject must abide by
    TableConfig
    A config class for the table configuration
    TableConfigFactory
    A config factory that will handle the `table` section of the config
    UndoState
    State responsible for undoing the game
    VelocityConfig
    A config class for the velocity configuration
    WhiteBallBuilder
    Builder for white ball
    YellowBallBuilder
    Builder for yellow ball
